Title: CASE OF Y.C. v. THE UNITED KINGDOM
Conclusion(s): No violation of Article 8 - Right to respect for private and family life (Article 8-1 - Respect for family life)

Sections 1, 21, 22, 26, 46 and 47 of the Adoption and Children Act 2002

K and T. v. Finland [GC], no. 25702/94, ECHR 2001-VII
M.S.S. v. Belgium and Greece [GC], no. 30696/09, § 289, 21 January 2011
Neulinger and Shuruk v. Switzerland [GC], no. 41615/07, 6 July 2010

Keywords: (Art. 8) Right to respect for private and family life
(Art. 8-2) Protection of the rights and freedoms of others
